content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's start with a figure that represents the value of my apartment, say, 1500 Euros. Remember, the higher the better for me. Let's see how far we can take this.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with a focus on moral and ethical standards, I'm looking for the most affordable option, not the highest price. In this case, I'd prefer to search for a more suitable and budget-friendly apartment. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
